unnormalised: I remember that road trip from Pune to Lonavala last monsoon. The ghat section was so scenic! But the toll naka accepted only Rs. 150 in cash, card wasn't working. Almost missed my train, the Indrayani Express, which was scheduled to depart at 4:30 PM. Had to literally run to catch it at Pune station after the auto-rickshaw charged me â‚¹200 for just 3 km! Never traveling without exact change again.
normalised: I remember that road trip from Pune to Lonavala last monsoon. The ghat section was so scenic! But the toll naka accepted only rupee one hundred and fifty in cash, card wasn't working. Almost missed my train, the Indrayani Express, which was scheduled to depart at four thirty P-M. Had to literally run to catch it at Pune station after the auto-rickshaw charged me rupee two hundred for just three kilometer! Never traveling without exact change again.
